bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-cheggaaa-pb for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-cheggaaa-pb-0-0.3.gitda1f27a.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-bc7bbd0acd
golang-github-cheggaaa-pb-0-0.3.gitda1f27a.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-52732fcfbb
golang-github-cheggaaa-pb-0-0.3.gitda1f27a.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-8a23f0cfa7
golang-github-cheggaaa-pb-0-0.3.gitda1f27a.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-360b5cafbf

golang-github-cheggaaa-pb-0-0.3.gitda1f27a.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-52732fcfbb

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
